title: Robots will soon be delivering your Domino’s Pizza | Trusted Reviews
description: ![Dominos Pizza Robot1]()### Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how to enable it](https://www.trustedreviews.com/news/how-to-enable-alexa-whisper-mode-echo-3607478 "Alexa’s new whisper mode rolls out in US today – here’s how toenable it")  * Plans for a UK debut for the robots are yet to be finalised and there areplenty of questions that we have ahead of them arriving.For example, what if the pizza turns up cold or an item is forgotten? Do wetip? And, will the robot have a bottle of coke stowed away like the driversometimes does for when we forget to order it?Starship also has deals in place with plenty of other companies such as JustEat and Hermes, and the UK will almost certainly be one of the next placesthat the Domino’s robots deliver.**Watch: Amazon Echo vs Google Home****Would you rather a robot delivers your pizza? Let us know in the commentsbelow.**
